attributes.action: Create a single smartcard that combines your National Identity, NHS, Driving Licence and National Insurance all on one card, Scrap the current idea of a new National ID card
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Create a single smartcard that combines your National Identity, NHS, Driving Licence and National Insurance all on one card. What’s the point in wasting money on creating a standalone national ID card when we already have our details spread across several government databases. Surely it makes sense to create a single database that each organisation can access to confirm our identity?
